sections.title: VideoGrace Installer
sections.preamble_install:
The VideoGrace video conferencing client application
will be installed on your computer.

Click Next to continue
sections.preamble_uninstall:
The VideoGrace video conferencing client application
will be removed from your computer

Click Next to continue
sections.install_completed:
The application is installed and ready to use

Press Done to continue
sections.uninstall_completed:
VideoGrace Client has been removed from your computer

Press Done to continue

sections.title: Error
sections.server_not_found:
Server %s is not responding. Perhaps there is no network connection or it is turned off.
If the address does not match your server address, you can specify the correct address in the server settings
and download the installer again by pressing No or press Yes and enter the server address manually.
sections.parse_error:
Error decrypting the settings. Uninstall this installer and download a new one from the server.
Important! Do not rename the installer file!
sections.incorrect_server_url: Incorrect server address (protocol must be http or https)
sections.empty_server_url: Enter the URL of your server of the form http://server-address:8778
sections.download_error: Error downloading the executable file, check the server version
sections.app_close_error: Failed to complete VideoGrace Client already running
